item.title: 解决"Access Not Configured. The API (YouTube Analytics API) is not enabled for your project."
item.description: 在用Google Developers OAuth 2.0 Playground试用Google YoutubeAnalytics API时总是返回下列403 Forbidden错误: { "code" : 403, "errors" : [ { "domain" : "usageLimits", "message" : "Access Not Configured. The API (YouTube Analytics API) is not enabled for your project. Please use the Google Developers Console to update your configuration.", "reason" : "accessNotConfigured", "extendedHelp" : "https://console.developers.google.com" } ], "message" : "Access Not Configured. The API (YouTube Analytics API) is not enabled for your project. Please use the Google Developers Console to update your configuration.
